page.title: 02BRIDGE FARM,COCKLAKE
page.content: {TYPE OF FARM}DAIRY AND BEEF{ {OCCUPANTS}MR AMESBURY ,WIFE AND CHILDREN {ANIMALS}35 FRIESIAN COWS, 3 GUERNSEY COWS,47 FRIESIAN BULLOCKS,1 WORKING DOG {PRODUCE}725 LITRES MILK PER DAY, BEEF AND HAY {WORKERS}3 PART TIME TO HELP HARROWING AND HAYMAKING {BUILDINGS}DUTCH BARN FOR HAY,CUBICAL SHED AND 3 TIN SHEDS FOR CATTLE AND MACHINERY {MACHINERY}3 INTERNATIONAL TRACTORS, 1 BAILER, 1 SPRAYER {BUYING AND SELLING THIS YEAR}20 COWS BOUGHT 55 TO BE SOLD ALTOGETHER {DAILY LIFE }UP AT 7.15a.m. COWS MILKED,HAVE BREAKFAST, MOVE ELECTRIC FENCES, CHECK STEERS, GENERAL JOBS TILL 12.00,HAVE DINNER, GENERAL JOBS UNTIL MILKING AT 4p.m.
